objects.description: [Stuxnet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0010) manipulates the view of operators replaying process input and manipulating the I/O image to evade detection and inhibit protection functions. (Citation: Ralph Langner November 2013) (Citation: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011)

external_references.description: Ralph Langner 2013, November To Kill a Centrifuge: A Technical Analysis of What Stuxnet's Creators Tried to Achieve Retrieved. 2018/03/27

external_references.source_name: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011
external_references.description: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien 2011, February W32.Stuxnet Dossier (Version 1.4) Retrieved. 2017/09/22
